subtitle: A rich medley of mixed fresh mushrooms. If you can't buy all the recommended varieties make up the recipe using dried ones.

method.text: Heat oil and butter together in large saucepan. Add garlic, sesame seeds and rosemary and cook for 30 seconds. Halve any large mushrooms then add all the mushrooms to pan. Cover and cook for 3 min, stirring occasionally. Add wine and cook over gentle heat for 1 min. Season to taste.
Meanwhile, cook egg noodles according to pack instructions and drain.
Stir egg noodles into mushrooms. Serve immediately.

title: Mixed mushrooms with noodles
